mapper.select: SELECT mes.mno, mes.sender, mes.receiver, SUBSTR(mes.content, 0, 10) AS content, mes.readstate, mes.senddate, mes.readdate, mem.username AS sendername FROM tbl_member mem, tbl_message mes WHERE mes.sender = mem.userid AND mes.receiver = #{receiver} AND mes.readstate != 'c' AND mes.receiverstate = 'n' ORDER BY mes.mno desc

SELECT mes.mno, mes.sender, mes.receiver, SUBSTR(mes.content, 0, 10) AS content, mes.readstate, mes.senddate, mes.readdate, mem.username AS receivername FROM tbl_member mem, tbl_message mes WHERE mes.receiver = mem.userid AND mes.sender = #{sender} AND mes.senderstate = 'n' ORDER BY mes.mno desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_message (mno, sender, receiver, content) VALUES (seq_mno.nextval, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{content})
